DOC.brief_summary: A randomize , parallel control clinical study investigate Huaier Granule prevention recurrence metastasis colorectal cancer radical surgery , evaluate efficacy safety .
DOC.brief_title: Huaier Granule As Adjuvant Therapy Colorectal Cancer After Radical Surgery
DOC.criteria: The subject volunteer sign informed consent ; Aged : 18 75 year old ; Colorectal cancer ( AJCCTNM , Stage Ⅰ , lowrisk Stage Ⅱand Stage Ⅲ ; Patients Stage Ⅲ colorectal cancer refuse postoperative adjuvant chemotherapy ) ; The diagnosis colorectal cancer confirm pathological examination radical surgery ; The liver kidney function satisfies follow condition within 15 day surgery ( exclude day 15 ) : aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) , glutamicoxalacetic transaminase ( ALT ) , alkaline phosphatase ( ALP ) < 2 upper limit normal ( ULN ) , total bilirubin ≤ 1.5 ULN , serum creatinine < 1.5 ULN ; normal coagulation function ; Other laboratory test meet following requirement within 15 day surgery ( exclude day 15 ) : white blood cell count ≥ 3.0×109/L , absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1.5×109/L , platelet count ≥ 100×109/L ; ECOG：02 points； No previous history malignancy . Multiple primary cancer ; Not recover colorectal surgery ; Presence organ , bone , skin metastasis ; Pregnant lactate woman ; Those active bleeding due various reason ; Those HIV infection AIDSassociated diseases ; Those severe acute chronic disease ; Those severe diabetes ; Those serious infectious disease ; Those take drug oral route ; Drug abuser psychological mental disease may interfere study compliance ; Conditions consider suitable study investigator .
